title: Influencers Fight COVID, A-Rod Bad At Thirst Trappin' 8.3.21
itunes:title: Influencers Fight COVID, A-Rod Bad At Thirst Trappin' 8.3.21
description:
In episode 964, Miles and guest co-host Jacquis Neal are joined by comedian Blair Socci to discuss Ron Desantis and his evil ways, the eviction moratorium expiring, A-Rod trying way too hard, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. DeSantis is truly some kind of demon, will TikTok save us?
  2. The eviction moratorium expired and Dems just went on vacation…
  3. A-Rod is TRYING TOO HARD
  4. LISTEN: Khruangbin - Time (You and I)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
